Matrix

Class SparseGateMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • Matrix.Matrix
      • Matrix.SparseGateMatrix

  • public class SparseGateMatrix
extends Matrix
    The concrete implementation of a sparse matrix. Can hold up to 2 non-zero elements in each row, ideal for quantum gates
    Author:
    Gennaro
